name: Mr. Triangle's Maze
description: Escape a sinister maze and take on the Maze Masters in this retro styled puzzle game!

name: The Questing
description: The Questing is an action-RPG game set in the fantasy world. You can grow by hunting enemies using various weapons and skills that you like. Also, feel free to explore the wide world, discover new towns and cities, and take quests from NPCs around the world to solve them.

name: The Legend of the Soulforce: Heroes of the Abyss
description: Heroes of the Abyss is an RPG featuring deep character customization and advanced combat mechanics. You will evolve in a universe plunged into the night by the god Asteros. Discover Asteros' dark motives and plans as you adventure through the abyss that has opened up in the world

name: The Last Starship
description: Introversion Software, the indie legends behind Prison Architect, Darwinia, DEFCON and Uplink, present to you the broken, unfinished and bug filled Alpha of The Last Starship. Pick a ship hull, kit her out with engines, life-support, sensors and rail guns and start your galactic adventure!

name: The Gallery
description: An art curator is held hostage by a portraitist who threatens to detonate a bomb unless their demands are met. 'The Gallery' contains two interactive narratives - set in 1981 (with a female protagonist) and 2021 (with a male protagonist).

name: The Chronicle
description: After receiving a package in the mail, Detective Walter Miles is suddenly transported to a World War II Era newspaper building. Can you solve the mystery and escape?

name: Terminal Madness: The Awakening
description: Terminal Madness 2 Awakening is the sequel and continues the story of Crypto, who tries to achieve his dream and become the greatest hacker in the world. Help Crypto to overcome all odds and immerse yourself in this fun, classic styled point and click adventure game.

name: Tanima
description: Tanima is a 2D action-roguelite deckbuilder with a heavy load of story-telling and exploration. Build your world with cards. Fight enemies. Meet new friends. Upgrade your character. Talk with TAnima. Go through the Last Doors to escape the dungeon!

name: Tales from the Under-Realm: After Midnight
description: TFTU: After Midnight is a dark / gothic visual novel with multiple endings. Your choices matter and will determine who stays alive and who dies. Discovering the whole truth about the murders will require more than one playthrough.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Kenya
description: Puzzles of Kenya!

name: Sunwave Hotel
description: Dive into a sexy sci-fi adventure that combines Point and Click with Dialogue Choices. After crash landing during a dangerous job, you and your partner must get back on your feet. Along the way, you'll solve problems and meet new friends to help you before your luck finally runs out.

name: Genopanic
description: Genopanic is a pixel-art, Metroidvania-inspired adventure-platformer. Explore corridors of the space station, teeming with secrets and dangers, and engage in boss fights. Solve puzzles and uncover hidden mysteries in the dark atmosphere of a sci-fi research complex. Discover the truth with each step.

name: Teen Titans Go! Drillionaire
description: Drillionaire is the sixth Teen Titans Go! game released online on the Cartoon Network website. It has six badges.

name: Sharp Storm
description: Sin descripción

name: Arma 3 Apex Edition
description: Experience the best military sandbox game the PC has to offer with the Arma 3 Apex Edition, which includes the Arma 3 base game, the highly-rated Arma 3 Apex expansion, and a variety of other DLC packs containing a number of additional weapons, vehicles, gear, and scenarios.

name: Reversary
description: A short LudumDare game with an interesting premise. A reverse boss battle action platformer where you play the role of adversary. See that big guy? That's you.

name: Beetlebum
description: Insect-themed classic survival horror demo with pre-rendered backgrounds.

name: Crunky
description: An endless jumping game where you have to die to expand your Crunkipedia.

name: Dragon Hunt Adventure
description: An adventure set in a classic rpg fantasy world.

name: Conquest of Helios
description: Build your army towards the ultimate goal of ruling the entire continent of Helios. Think of Risk but with a bit more complexity.

name: Trapdoors
description: A game for Playdate - Make them fall into the right pit!

name: Tim Tooth
description: Sin descripción

9:05 is a 'port' of the 2000 text adventure of the same name by Adam Cadre, created as a test of the Pulp system for Playdate when Pulp was released originally.

It has no sound (due to a Pulp bug, the phone was supposed to ring), crummy graphics (yeah that one's my fault) and a small amount of the content that was originally in the text adventure was removed due to the translation from text to this, but the original game's spirit is still there, including the game's four endings.

name: Pulpergeist
description:
An unmarked letter appears on your desk. A boy has gone missing.

With work having dried up, you decide to take on the case. What you'll soon discover however is a mystery far more ghoulish than you could have imagined.

Pulpergeist is a classic point-and-click adventure game made for Playdate with Pulp. Solve puzzles, escape dangerous traps and enemies, and work to uncover the truth behind the missing child.

name: The S.Sterling Co.
description: This is a game about three cats living in one office.

name: Wani Wani Picnic
description:
Guide Ally the hungry gator to the picnic. If any baddies get in your way, it's ok, just gobble 'em up! But something tells me Ally might get full before she reaches her goal!

Wani Wani Picnic was created as part of the gamejam, a game by its cover 2015. It is based on the cartridge art created by happymappyart (formerly mandimandi) for Famicase 2015.

name: Bag Boy Memory
description: A Playdate remake of Sonic Advance's memory minigame

name: ZOZ: Final Hour
description: 15-player Adventure Zombie Game

name: Pop Pop
description: A fish-popping game for the playdate.

name: Sussy's Floppy Disk-venture
description: Play as Sussy! A little dude with a backpack who just wants to go and play some bedwars on his computer!

name: Escape From Complex 32
description: Escape with your crank controlled laser!

name: LlamaTangle
description: Untangle all of the points so that no lines cross

name: Blind
description:
A short visual novel for NaNoRenO 2020.

Someone wakes with no memory and can't move their body or see anything. They try to understand who they are while the trauma of their past catches up to them.

Inspired by PSX sound novels with very little art but instead a focus on sound effects and music to build atmosphere.

name: Pumpkins vs. Monsters
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixies 'n Crafts
description:
Pixies 'n Crafts is a 2D platform game with crafting elements.

In it you take on the role of the King, who deploys his energy in the form of adorable creatures to help you escape a terrible monster.

Deep in an unknown universe, there was this monster, which devoured all the matter that was in front of it. He was insatiable, and she never stopped eating. After an era of destruction, unable to take it anymore, something that could perhaps be called “the good essence” of the creature to separate itself from this entity and escaped inside, creating its own world, where its other part would find it. This planet was totally different from the others, there was life, and life cooperated with the development of this planet. Then the creator creature split into several parts, giving way to an intelligent civilization that would further prosper this place. The monster spent years hunting this part and the planet, as it was weakened without its other part.

name: X-Plane 11: Skyline Simulations - KAST: Astoria Regional Airport
description: Fly above Astoria and enjoy the night view with perfect landmarks like the Astoria Column, the Light House and the famous Megler Bridge!

name: Skies of Blue: Remake
description: Skies Of Blue Remake is a First Person Puzzle Platformer in that you go from level to level. Collect all Collectables, complete all levels and build your own in the custom level editor!

name: Cloudy Super Mario Bros. U 2
description: Sequel to the New Super Mario Bros. U mod Cloudy SMBU. This mod features 40+ levels, many new tilesets and an original soundtrack composed of brand new tracks and remixes.

name: Our Wonderland
description: A horror-fantasy visual novel about five childhood friends returning to the wish-granting wonderland of their youth.

name: Slotter Up Core 5
description: Slotter Up Core 5: Lupin Daisuki! Shuyaku wa Zenigata is a pachinko simulation based on the Lupin manga.

name: Slotter Up Core 6
description: Slotter UP Core is a Japanese pachislot game based on the manga/anime series Star of the Giants.

name: Slotter Up Core 8
description: Slotter Up Core 8 - Gokuenda! Kyojin no Hoshi 3 is a pachinko simulation based on the anime known as Kyojin no Hoshi (Star of the Giants.)

name: Distraction Machine
description: Welcome to Island City, an isolated metropolis filled with undead feeders and survivors battling over what few safe havens remain. You are The Distractor - a warrior bard wielding the power to soothe the living and control the undead. But will your music save your people or lead them to ruin?

name: Ninjaman
description: Ninjaman is an 8-bit platformer street brand game where you throw love at zombies to turn them into homies and no one ever really gets hurt or dies. Because there is a Ninja With A Gold Chain. Are you the one? Can you help Ninjaman save Atlantokyo and throw the best party ever?!

name: Questlike: Pocket - Monster Hunt
description:
Questlike: Pocket is a beat-bumping, monster-mashing RPG!
Battle Beasts, Craft Gear, and become a World Class Monster Hunter!

name: The Dead Rooms
description: The Dead Rooms is an immersive horror experience with Roguelike elements. Can you survive? Explore a never ending world of rooms, as you push further into the Dead Rooms, trying to find what supplies you can and avoiding the monsters that call this place home.

name: Amma: Chronicles of Lost Stars
description:
Inspired by the mythology and culture of the Dogon, an ethnic indigenous group in Mali, Amma: Chronicles of Lost Stars is an Afrofantasy action-adventure role-playing game with a focus on story and exploration.

The central character in the game is Aya, a teenage weaver from the village of Jûlaya who sees her destiny shift radically when she is chosen by God Nommo as the Guardian to prevent the destruction of the world.

Amma: Chronicles of Lost Stars will feature a diverse set of locations, characters, demons, and bosses, with strategic, dynamic combat that fuses magic, martial arts, and melee weapons.

name: ColdFortune
description: Coldfortune is a third-person survival adventure game from developer Frostware. Its exploration sequences use fixed-camera perspectives for a moody view of the world ahead, and when the action heats up, expect dangerous gunplay and cinematic hand-to-hand QTE combat.

name: Formula One 2000
description: Formula One 2000 is an officially licensed Formula One racing game.

name: Arbiter
description: Arbiter is an intense, multiplayer arena shooter in VR. Blast yourself around the battle grid with an assortment of weapons in destructible environments. Each round is a new arbitration with players representing a side procedurally decided upon by the all-powerful Arbiter AI.

name: BPM Boy
description: BPM Boy is a physics-based platformer, with influences from games like Marble Madness, Super Monkey Ball, deBlob and Crystal Castles. BPM Boy features multiple routes, hidden secrets, and an original soundtrack driven by RetroNinja's Dynamic Music & Sound Regulator (DMSR). The funky grooves change and react to how you play.

name: Medarot 4: Kuwagata Version
description:
Medarot 4 was released in 2001 for the Game Boy Color. Like its predecessors, it was released in two versions: Kabuto Version and Kuwagata Version.

The game follows Ikki Tenryou and his friends in the town of Omikuji. A new teacher by the name of Ryuuko Yamikumo gets hired at Ikki's school and confiscates all of the class' Medarotches and deletes everyone's data, forcing them to start over in order to train them. Meanwhile, there are rumors of a group called the "Four Kings" wreaking havoc in Omikuji. Medarot 4 incorporates many of the gameplay changes made in Medarot 3.

name: Vacation Island
description: Vacation Island is a short reverse-horror game, with a tiny open world to explore and dark secrets to uncover. Made in 14 days for the 2022 Spring 32bits Jam.

name: Hangover
description: Your buddy drank too much last night and he wants a pizza. But you should probably pilot the mech, cause he might still be drunk.

name: Man or Muppet
description: An essay on muppets and my trans life.

name: Deadlink
description: Deadlink is a cyberpunk FPS with roguelite elements. You're the first operative to be recruited to the experimental Deadlink project. Pilot an autonomous combat shell, fighting your way through cramped slums, twisted labs, grimy warehouses, and sleek office buildings on a mission to thwart the schemes of the most powerful corporations in the world. Wield a deadly arsenal, upgrade your skills and tech, devastate destructible environments, and slash corporate profit margins — all at the same time.

name: People are Labyrinths
description: An investigation of the concept of labyrinths, mazes, emotional exploration, and mutual intimacy.

name: Mogu-mogu Rumia
description: A doujin game by Top Arts plan based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Maid Made Maze
description: A doujin game by Top Arts plan based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: West Balkans
description:
Discover, deliver and expand your trucking company to the countries of Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Kosovo, Montenegro, North Macedonia, Serbia, and Slovenia.

From large bustling cities to the countryside filled with beautiful nature, you will be able to explore what the Western Balkans have to offer.

You can look forward to many new things that these countries have to offer. Whether in terms of the industry, nature, landmarks, road networks, or a lot of other exciting content!

name: Rhythm Banki
description: A doujin game by Kyuushoku Touban based on the Touhou Project series.

name: 1001 Touch Games
description: Never get bored again with 1001 Touch games, the largest collection of "pick-up-and-play" interactive games available!

name: Extreme Bankikki
description: A doujin game by Kyuushoku Touban based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Cirno no Saikyou Kakigoori Daisakusen!
description: A doujin game by Kyuushoku Touban based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Medarot DS: Kuwagata Version
description: Medarot DS: Kuwagata Ver. is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Rocket Company, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: Strider Hiryuu
description: NEC Avenue's Strider Hiryuu is a port of the coin-op for the PC Engine. This port is infamous for its protracted development, as it was originally announced as a HuCard for the PC Engine SuperGrafx in 1990 before undergoing various format changes, ultimately being released as a CD-ROM game for the Arcade Card add-on in late 1994. Its most noticeable changes are new animated cutscenes, arranged Red Book-quality soundtrack, and an optional bonus mission between the first and second stages, set in a desert. Otherwise, the game plays similar to the coin-op. The new cutscenes appear to have inspired the later Strider 2, as both games use similar wireframe maps for their stage introductions.

name: Ojou-sama no Doki-doki Daisakusen: Norowareta Kurenai no Yakata
description: Ojou-sama no DokiDoki Daisakusen is a fan-made Touhou Project platform action game, developed by BlueMica. It features Remilia Scarlet as the protagonist and Flandre Scarlet as the second protagonist. Saigyouji Yuyuko is also a playable character.

name: Aeron's Golden Cookie Quest
description: Total conversion hack of Super Mario World by Anorakun.

name: Magical Stick Girl Miracle Kurun Survival!
description: Magical stick girl Miracle Kurun Survival! is a doujin shoot-em-up developed by Desunoya Games.

name: Gran Empire: Amane
description: Sin descripción

name: Roasting Report: A Professor Murder
description: Sin descripción

name: That Summer
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Toy With Me
description:
For a long time now, Dahlia has lived by herself in the Dollhouse with only the stuffed rabbit Wisker for company. One day the owner of the toys decides to present her with a new companion, a sad clown puppet named Huxley. She's delighted for the company but, as the owner soon realizes, it's not so simple to introduce a new friend to the household.

What happens when you play favorites? Are you really in control of the Dollhouse? Or are the toys about to get out of hand

name: Knights of the Deep
description: Knights of the Deep is an online, action-packed arena fighting game with crustaceans. Choose your favorite brawler from the seas and duke it out against each other using a variety of weapons and special abilities. Each crustacean has a unique playstyle, learn them all and climb the hierarchy!

name: 3D Puzzle: Japan
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Try Me
description: Try Me is a 3D Platform game where moving a ball to a floating square has never been more difficult. This game is completely torque based and all about momentum.

name: Necrosmith
description: A necromancer simulator. Assemble the dead using different body parts while upgrading your tower, combine the abilities of the different fantastic races to fight your way through the hordes of enemies and overrun the ’chosen ones’. To tell the truth, the dead are pretty, uhm, dumb.

name: Treefender
description: Relive your childhood in Treefender: a VR-exclusive 4 player online co-op game where you build your own treefort and defend it against an alien invasion!

name: Putinator
description: The Russian army tried to clone their leader, thus resulting in a never ending mindless horde of Putin zombies... In this retro inspired shooter you take the role of a soldier sent as clean up crew to a town on the outskirts of Chernobyl, with one mission. Kill all Putin zombies.

name: The Way of the Badass
description: Join Scarlet, Princess of Badass, in her crusades against the takeover of aliens, monsters, hybrids, and "Cancel Culture" as she brings toughness back to humanity. Lead desperate allies, from a Nazi to a hobo and other Special Ed students, in liberating humankind from the satire of the Far Left.

name: SailSim
description: This sailing simulator applies actual physics to simulate the behavior of a sailing vessel. This means you can actually capsize or sink a vessel if you are not careful. In some cases the simulator can even reproduce unpredictable results based on your actions, selected parameters and conditions.

name: Paranoya
description: This is a liminal horror game where you are sent to supernatural dimensions, you must defeat the demon and his workers though multiple levels to escape and go back to your normal life.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Industrial Switching
description: Somewhere in Canada, in the city of Longview, offers a challenging industrial park that will challenge the train crews critical thinking skills to navigate and properly spot the freight cars. Industrial Switching is an industrial themed route servicing 15 industries.

name: Traffic Safety: Air Scrambled Hard
description: This game is used to educate everyone on the importance of traffic safety. Pilot the plane carefully to avoid the birds on the route. The DLC will adjust the game's difficulty to Hard mode from the 31st mission.

name: Under the Jolly Roger: Complete Edition
description:
The Complete Edition includes:
- Under the Jolly Roger - an open-world pirate RPG with trading, diplomacy, and mythical bosses!
- Pirate City - DLC that focuses on the history of Chinese seafaring. Travel the high seas as a new female playable character.
- Jade Sea - a DLC pack that lets players build and develop their own settlements.

name: Atomicrops: Reap What You Bundle
description: The Atomicrops Reap What You Bundle features the Atomicrops full game and the Reap what you Crow DLC in one fertilized package.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Ravager Edition
description: Far atop the frozen Valkürian Range lives a tribe known for their capacity to call the elements. Some fear their ravaging strength, but few know their true name.

name: Digerati Presents: Indie Darling Bundle Vol. 5
description: A dynamic duo of acclaimed indies from Digerati! This bundle contains Unbound: Worlds Apart, and Apsulov: End of Gods.

name: Yuki and Rina Football
description: Yuki & Rina are 2 young talented football players. They showed incredible football skills and their coach and manager decided it was time to train them to become Pro Players in the famous “Soccer stars Major Football League”. Before becoming Pro Players, Yûki & Rina must pass the ultimate test, which is a combination of agility, skills and reflex.

name: Animal Puzzle for Toddlers and Kids
description: Easy to use puzzles for ages two and up. Featuring funny and cute animal motifs with 30 unique puzzles. 100% frustration free and child-safe.

name: Knowledge Challenge
description: This game helps you entertain after stressful working hours. We bring you quizzes on many topics such as: Books, Movies, Music... There are 3 levels of play for each topic. The puzzle database is updated regularly. We are still working to bring more game modes. Have fun!

name: Isometric World
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic Bundle
description:
The bundle includes:
- STAR WARS KOTOR: It is four thousand years before the Galactic Empire and hundreds of Jedi Knights have fallen in battle against the ruthless Sith. You are the last hope of the Jedi Order. Can you master the awesome power of the Force on your quest to save the Republic? Or will you fall to the lure of the dark side?

- STAR WARS KOTOR II: 5 years after the events of the award winning original, the Sith are on the verge of crushing the Old Republic. As a lone Jedi, will you follow the light side or succumb to the dark?

name: Later Daters: Premium
description: You're the newest resident at Ye OLDE retirement community, where you'll meet a cast of sexy seniors who are all dying (not literally) to meet you. It's a lot like summer camp, but with orthopedic shoes, bridge clubs, and more jell-o.

name: Casino Golf
description: Beat 50 levels and feel the adrenaline like in a casino! Place a bet and put the ball in the hole. You can increase the multiplier by playing the "VaBanque" with all your money.

name: Bewilderword
description: Sin descripción

name: Mischief Dungeon Life
description: “Mischief Dungeon Life" is an isekai fantasy novel game in which Renji is reborn in another world as a demon. He encounters various heroines while playing a big role in the fates of both the Demon Clan and the Human Tribe.

name: Dino Tales
description: The multi-award winning Dinosaur kids app, Dino Tales, is now on Nintendo Switch. Dino Tales takes you on a journey to a vivid, prehistoric world full of fun activities and places to explore.

name: Firegirl: Hack 'n Splash Rescue DX
description: Take on the role of a young rescue officer starting her career. Armed with a trusty axe and high-pressure fire hose that also acts as a jetpack, Firegirl responds to emergency calls across the city.

name: LittleHero
description: Sin descripción

name: Kitty Cat Doctor
description: Sin descripción

name: Doodle Devil: 3volution - Puzzles & Quests
description: Continue exploring the dark side with new elements and reactions! - Invade Hell in the "Let there be light in Hell" quest - Create witch in the "Wicked Witch" puzzle - Celebrate Halloween in the "Pumpkin Chaos" puzzle

name: Metal Max Xeno Reborn: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Explore a vast wasteland Traverse the deadly ruins of Tokyo Bay which remains teeming with mechanical beasts hell-bent on hunting humanity to extinction. Travel and battle in a tank or on foot to uncover the mysteries that lay buried beneath the sands.

name: Excalibur
description:
Welcome to the Excalibur Wiki. This fan-run encyclopedia preserves the details of an obscure science fantasy television series from the 1970s. Though much of its footage was lost, a group of dedicated fans still have strong memories of the show — as well as unique theories, occasional arguments, and lingering questions.

Excalibur is a hypertext-based interactive fiction piece written and developed by J.J. Guest and G.C. Baccaris, with contributions from co-creator Duncan Bowsman and others.

name: Coloring Book: Treasure Adventure
description: Evolve your coloring skills in 30 adventurous pictures.

name: Coloring Book: Ocean Animals
description: Unveil your creativity coloring 30 pictures with beautiful ocean animals.

name: Coloring Book: Farm Life
description: Express your creativity coloring 30 pictures from a typical Farm Life.

name: Hexceed: Rimor
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Rimor! Puzzle your way through 100+ brand new levels!

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine - Deluxe Edition
description:
Time to explore Asian Food and become the best gourmet cooking master at your brand new food truck! Take orders, make delicious dishes and be fast to serve the hordes of hungry customers who will queue in front of your counter!

In this Deluxe Edition you will get both:
- Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine
- Food Truck Tycoon: Asian Cuisine - Expansion Pack #2

name: hexceed: Effugium
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Effugium! Puzzle your way through 100+ brand-new levels!

name: Hexceed: Casus
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Casus! Puzzle your way through 100+ brand new levels!

name: Rolling Car: Deluxe Edition
description:
Drive your car on the looping conveyor belt where tight platforming awaits you. Use your ride's built-in rocket jump and turbo to nimbly overcome traps.

The Deluxe Edition comes with additional car skins.

name: Tiny Island
description: Meditative and fluffy God simulator in VR wherein you will help tiny people with chopsticks!

name: Trainz Plus
description: Drive, Explore, Operate and Create the railroad of your dreams - and now collaborate in real time with Multiplayer Surveyor! And with Trainz Plus memberships, you get more content, more features and the latest Trainz has to offer!

name: Trainz Plus: Znamensk-Svir
description: Znamensk-Svir: A fictional route, built on the motives of the North-West of Russia. The Znamensk-Svir section is a two-track electrified section of alternating current with a length of 70 kilometers.

name: Trainz Plus: ZecRail V499 Blue & Gold and Christmas 2019
description: ZecRail V499 Baldwin Compound - Blue and Gold and Christmas 2019

name: Trainz Plus: Warwick to Wallangarra Route
description: Follow the QR Southern railway line through the Darling Downs and into Granite country, right to the border with New South Wales.

name: Trainz Plus: ZecRail 2017 Christmas Train
description: This year, ZecRail brings you the new type 4 D1 class locomotive decorated for Christmas 2017, with a string of goods wagons and passenger carriages to bring Christmas cheer to the people in your virtual world!

name: Trainz Plus: VR Healesville 1913-1920 TRS19
description: Drive classic Victorian Railways steam locomotives through the famed Yarra Valley, north east of Melbourne, during the WW1 era. Comes with a selection of pre-made sessions, a pre-made multiplayer freeplay session, and a variety of Victorian Railways steam locomotives and rolling stock.

name: Trainz Plus: Victorian Railways V class FL Black
description: Drive the Victorian Railways V class steam locomotive, painted in a freelance black livery with 3 levels of weathering.

name: Trainz Plus: Victorian Railways V499 - Baldwin Built
description: Victorian Railways V499 2-8-0 Baldwin Compound in Baldwin Green and Canadian Red.

name: Trainz Plus: Victorian Railways Type 4 DD Class Pack - Canadian Red
description: Victorian Railways DD class (Type 4- Wide Cab) 4-6-0 tender locomotives in Canadian Red and WW1 red.

name: Trainz Plus: Victorian Railways Type 2 DD Class Pack
description: 5 locomotives, in 5 liveries, in broad gauge and standard gauge (10 locomotives total)

name: Trainz Plus: Utah Belt AC4400CW 4400-4450
description: Representation of the fictional and popular HO scale layout railroad Utah Belt AC4400s. As per the HO scale prototype models these units have functional gyra lights.

name: Trainz Plus: US ATC Class S 160 Steam
description: This pack contains two versions of this unique steam locomotive, as well as one session for the “Kicksarter County“ route. Treat yourself to something special, sniff the air of yesteryear and drive one of the locomotives built in great quantities in days gone past.

name: Trainz Plus: UP AC4400CW #5982-6081
description: The 5982-6081 Series was delivered to the Union Pacific Railroad between the years of 2004/2005. This delivery was the very last AC4400CW order from GE for the UP. This model is a representation of this series between the years 2010 to current. Cabs are exactly created to prototype.

name: Trainz Plus: Victorian Railways D1 Class - Type 4: Newport - Black
description: Victorian Railways D1 class (Type 4- Wide Cab) 4-6-0 tender locomotives in all over black.

name: Trainz Plus: Switch Model Railroad - TRS19
description: Switch Model Railroad is a small two baseboard route that offers plenty of switching opportunities between the yard and the industries.

name: Trainz Plus: The BiDye Traction Railroad Route
description: The BiDye Traction Railroad shows off the versatility of Trainz: A New Era by creating a virtual model railroad for you to explore and enjoy inside a large garage.

name: Trainz Plus: The Broadway Limited
description: 3DZUG is taking you back to the golden ages of the American railroads and brings you one of the most famous US trains, Pennsylvania Railroad’s “Broadway Limited”.

name: Eins Ring
description: A doujin game by ZWEi based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Polar Bear Riding A Ninja
description: Endless runner with roguelite elements. throw pineapples to defeat enemies while running away from a polar bear riding a ninja. Chose items to throw better, jump higher and defend yourself.

name: Ukraine Defense Force Tactics
description:
Ukraine Defense Force Tactics is a turn-based tactics game in which you lead a small force of Ukrainian units fighting against a seemingly endless deluge of Russian invaders. You will have to outsmart and outmaneuver an overwhelming force of enemies using combined infantry-and-armor tactics and an array of special Stratagems.
Your goal is to destroy as many enemies as possible before needing to retreat your forces. By defeating enemies you gain Glory which then can be used to upgrade your units and unlock new ones.

name: Toaru Pants no Railgun
description: A Doujin game based on Toaru Kagaku no Railgun, developed by werk.

name: Leap of Phase: Samantha
description:
Leap of Phase is a first-person puzzle game. You will need to solve puzzle rooms by utilizing personal teleporter units. Place up to three of these at any time you want.

You thought it would be the chance of a lifetime when tech giant IRT hired you to work in their new testing facility. But now… you’re a guina pig for experimental teleporting technology and suspect that something is wrong with this company. Very wrong...

name: Remedium
description: The fast-paced twin-stick shooter game in the grim post-apocalyptic Renaissance setting. It had been more than a hundred years since the terrible plague devoured the whole Europe and turned almost everyone there in the maddened mutants.

name: Cooking Championship
description: Take part in the Cooking Championship! Create a unique character. Admire beautiful scenery. Prepare original dishes. Compete with other participants. Please the jury. And win the tournament!

name: Don't Get Distracted
description: Don't Get Distracted is a horror themed rage game. Stay focused, pay attention and you might live to see another day. Good Luck

name: Under the Moon
description: Under the Moon is an indie, platformer - riddle game which adorned with great stylized graphics and atmosphere. Join Ali Kemal on his fantastic world-wide journey on the path of true love!

name: Space Rescue
description: Space Rescue is a special space adventure game.You will navigate a tiny spaceship to slip into the puzzle where the Energy Spinels hidden. They have to glide up and down, avoiding a series of obstrucles, and eventually carry the Spinels back to their mother planet.

name: The Swordbearer
description: Take on the role of a young adventurer who recently inherited a sword. Your journey starts after you apply to the Knights Guild at the capital. Meet loveable characters as you explore this world that awaits you. Face the darkness that surfaces and uncover the evil plot as your story progresses.

name: The Wakers
description: Great energies are stirring, now it's time to wake. Revive giant spirits in this playfully mystical puzzle odyssey.

name: Thnt
description: You've woken up in an artificial body on a strange and hostile world. Can you uncover its secrets and fight your way out? Take part in a metal fueled FPS single-player campaign that combines frantic action with tactical decision-making.

name: Thrill Penguin
description: crazy parkour game with No cycles, No texts, No complicated weird mechanics, Just have fun and get the thrill now !!

name: Broken Edge
description:
Broken Edge is a VR multiplayer fantasy dueling game where you embody historical sword fighters. Use their unique techniques and powers combined with cutting-edge fencing mechanics to claim victory against online components and climb the ranks!

All characters are equipped with unique weapons, coupled with their own distinctive martial arts style. Learn to master these ancient fighting patterns to awaken the energy of your blade and dominate your foes online.

name: Final Fury
description: A multiplayer VR fighting game created by Kluge, studio behind the dance-action VR rhythm game Synth Riders.

name: HeliSquad: Covert Operations
description: Sin descripción

name: The Twilight Zone VR
description: Where nothing is as it seems and everything feels possible.

name: PathCraft
description: PathCraft was designed with the possibilities and limitations of the Go in mind. The enemies are not only a danger to the robots but to the player themselves.

name: A.R.S.E.N.A.L. Taste of Power
description: Sin descripción

name: River Bones
description:
You float down the river. You remember:

The Hotel, The Town, The Parking Lot, The Lake, The Fire, The Chase.

name: Liminal Phase
description: Liminal Phase is a VR action horror game set in a parallel ‘90s. Fight malevolent monsters, solve peculiar puzzles, and explore the dark corners of a fractured mind consumed by video games.

name: The Jumping Fries: Turbo
description: Join BIG F on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!

name: Wands Alliances
description: Wands Alliances is a 3v3, competitive, team-based, multiplayer VR gaming experience where players engage in fast-paced magic duels. Select your class, choose your spells, and take the fight to the streets. Taste sweet victory by completing your team’s objectives or eliminating the opposing team. But duck and dodge too slowly, and the only thing you’ll be eating are fireballs.

name: Next Player Please
description: Next Player Please is the first fun and engaging VR party game played around a table with friends and only one device that is passed around the table Taking advantage of shared spaces and the quality of social play, we offer fun and easy to learn mini-games in VR without the need for multiple devices or a fixed playspace.

name: Eolia
description: Drop the controllers and save a desert world with Hands First VR in the follow-up to award-winning Ionia. Eolia, the symphonic fantasy-adventure follow-up in the award-winning Rhythm of the Universe series, reveals a brand-new world of storytelling.

name: What the Bat?
description: You have baseball bats for hands - now go! In this surprising VR comedy, you play through a series of silly physical mini-games that make you laugh, cry and even pet nice animals.

name: The Last of Us Part I
description:
Experience the emotional storytelling and unforgettable characters of Joel and Ellie in The Last of Us, winner of over 200 Game of the Year awards and now rebuilt for PlayStation 5.

Enjoy a total overhaul of the original experience, faithfully reproduced but incorporating modernized gameplay, improved controls and expanded accessibility options. Plus, feel immersed with improved effects and enhanced exploration and combat.

It also includes the Left Behind story DLC.

name: Basket Random
description: Basket Random! Basketball is here with its most funny and random way. In Basket Random game, try to score a basket by using only one key with different variations from each other! Changing fields, changing players and changing balls do not surprise you! You can be the best of them all. You can play Basket Random game either against CPU or against a friend in 2 player gaming mode! The one who reaches 5 score first, wins the game. Have Fun!

name: Mahjong Haoh: Dankyuu Battle II
description: Mahjong Haoh: Dankyuu Battle II is a mahjong game.

name: Aliens: Dark Descent
description: Drop into the gripping journey of Aliens: Dark Descent, a squad-based, single-player action game in the iconic Alien franchise. Lead your soldiers in real-time to stop a new and terrifying kind of Xenomorph outbreak on Planet Lethe.

name: Fort Solis
description: Fort Solis is a single player third person thriller set on the far side of Mars. Engineer Jack Leary responds to a routine alarm. Upon arriving at a dormant Fort Solis he becomes unnerved by the lack of any staff at the base. As the night grows longer events begin to unravel and spiral out of control. The mystery of what Fort Solis was created for starts to appear along with its crew. Can Jack escape with what he has discovered and more importantly, his life?

name: Nurtopu: Fetö ile Mücadele
description: For a long time, Fetö has been a problem for İsmail, the art teacher. Ismail seeks revenge, but unlike Wolverine, he does not want to get his hands dirty. Therefore, he reads the Risale-i Nur and prays at home. Nurtopu, İsmail's female rabbit, decides to do something about this and goes on a great adventure. At this point, you, the player, must control Nurtopu to put an end to Fetö and avenge İsmail.

name: Stormgate
description: Stormgate is a free-to-play, next-gen RTS from the team at Frost Giant Studios, including former developers of Warcraft III and StarCraft II. Command mechs to defend the Earth or invade it as one of two other invading alien factions. Explore an ever-evolving campaign storyline, group up for co-op missions, or compete in 1v1. Now in Early Access since August 13th.

name: Highwater
description: Highwater is a story-driven 3D adventure game with isometric turn-based combat set in a flooded post-apocalyptic urban environment. Navigate the world by boat, discover islands, and find new allies to help battle foes in turn-based combat.

name: Goat Simulator 3
description: Pilgor’s baaack! Gather your herd and venture forth into Goat Simulator 3; a totally realistic, sandbox farmyard experience. Invite up to three friends in local or online co-op, create carnage together, or compete in mini-games and then not be friends.

name: Warframe: The Duviri Paradox
description: A Mad King, a mysterious Drifter, and a color-shifting unreality as sublime as it is deadly combine in the latest addition to Warframe’s ever-expanding universe, The Duviri Paradox!

name: Humankind: Cultures of Latin America
description: The Humankind Cultures of Latin America DLC includes:- 6 New Cultures - 6 New Wonders- 9 Independent Peoples- 15 Narrative Events- 30+ New in-game themed music tracks composed by Arnaud Roy

name: Layers of Fear
description:
Layers of Fear is a first-person psychedelic horror chronicle focused on tense exploration and immersive storytelling - a new game built upon the foundations of Layers of Fear, LOF: Inheritance, and Layers of Fear 2 with a surprising new story and gameplay direction

All stories must come to an end, even twisted and eerie ones. The canvas. The stage. The novel. This narrative-focused psychological horror experience is ready for its final brushstrokes, its curtain call, its final chapter. Are you ready to return and face your fears one last time?

name: Steel Guardian
description: Explore, loot, discover and fight!

name: Kinfire Chronicles
description: Kinfire Chronicles is a cooperative, quest-based RPG board game set in a brand-new fantasy universe.

name: Unrooted
description: Unrooted is a vibrant and eye-catching precision platformer with lush environments and a stunning musical score. Take up your courage and squash your fear of heights. Travel upwards to lands no sapling has dared to explore before. But heed with caution, the higher you journey, the more you risk.

name: Time Flies
description: This whimsical game is part open world and part flight simulator – and you play it as a fly! You are provided with a bucket list that you can complete before you die. But the life of a fly is short – and the list is long! Go ahead and learn an instrument, become rich, read a book, go on tour, find yourself, get drunk, make someone laugh or enter the art world! And if you don’t feel like pursuing your life goals, just hang, clean your wings, listen to music or watch television. Make the best of the time you have! Because we are all going to die.

name: FarmingCat
description: You're a cat in a world of islands. You can explore, craft, cook, build, destroy, collect drops and discover items of old ancestors. Don't worry about monsters, no one will attack you. But you have to care about food, stamina and economy!

name: Diggergun
description:
Diggergun is an oppressive, 2D, platformer about workers, low wages and the environment.

Will you band together with others to push back against your corporate oppressors, side with your employer to get a leg up or just escape at the first opportunity possible?

name: The Curse of Grimsey Island
description: Four separate cases spanning hundreds of years. Are they linked by a curse or something else entirely? The Curse of Grimsey Island is a futuristic detective game where you collect evidence, find motives, and solve one of the greatest mysteries in modern times.

name: Trials of Kokoro
description: In this turn-based RPG, you will customize a group of heroes' equipment, skills, and strengths, before leading them into exciting battles. Strategic, turn-based combat, detailed party management, and an emotional story come together in this grand, epic adventure across the continent of Vitaria.

name: Nightmare Slash
description: "Nightmare Slash" is a 2D slasher with a side view. The player uses mouse to cut his enemies, to dodge and run from flying creatures, wait for the moment to kill dark enemies who gets in his way.

name: Aloft
description: Survive on floating islands caught in an eternal hurricane in this atmospheric sandbox survival indie game. Build your base and sail the winds to discover new islands and fight back fungi corruption while upgrading your gear. Reach the highest altitudes and brave their challenges.

name: Desta: The Memories Between
description: Desta: The Memories Between is a character-driven rogue-like, featuring an immersive story, strategic turn-based tactics and… a metaphorical ball-game?

name: Fox and Frog Travelers: The Demon of Adashino Island
description: Fox and Frog Travelers: The Demon of Adashino Island is a 3D action adventure game mixed with some Japanese culture elements.

name: Birth
description: Birth is a pleasantly creepy point-and-click puzzle game about living alone in a large city and constructing a creature to keep you company out of spare bones and organs you find lying around. Explore libraries, post offices, museums, cafes, and apartments that don't belong to you, solving observational puzzles hidden in personal belongings and scenery.

name: Gensou Tansaku Nitroid!
description: Gensou Tansaku Nitroid! is a puzzle and exploration based platformer by the doujin circle Desunoya, the makers of other Touhou fangames such as Marisa and Alice and Guruguru Suika. The game stars Nitori Kawashiro as she explores Gensokyo in pursuit of an escaped "nuclear reactor."

name: Little Nemo and the Guardians of Slumberland
description: Explore a dream world as Little Nemo, armed with toys, candy, and stuffed animals in this colorful platforming metroidvania adventure.

name: The Plucky Squire
description: Storybook characters discover a three-dimensional world outside the pages of their book and must jump between 2D & 3D realms to save their friends in this charming action-adventure.

name: Bouhou Koumakyou: Scarlet Family
description: Bouhou Koumakyou ~Scarlet Family~ is a dungeon exploring action platformer developed by Marokaka.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time - Expansion Disk
description: A ROM hack/mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time which recreates the original design of its cancelled Expansion for the Nintendo 64DD, which was later cancelled and retooled as the Master Quest. It changes the dungeons, changing their layout and puzzles. It was based on the information found within the 2020 Gigaleak.

name: Pac-Man
description: The NES port of the arcade classic.

name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium
description: Capcom is taking you back to the stadium with another collection of your favorite classic hits! Come see what's changed, and what's completely new, in Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium!

name: Pac-Man
description: The Game Boy port of the arcade classic.

name: Little Aid
description: Little Aid is a otome game by Takuyo for PC and PlayStation 2.

name: Little Aid Portable
description: A port of the original Little Aid for PlayStation Portable.

name: Aftonbuilt
description:
Aftonbuilt was a dark new take on the Five Nights at Freddy's franchise.

The player is tasked with surviving four of the most harrowing locations in Fazbear history using only their wits, movement, and a set of handmade tools. Using these, the player will have to fight back, striking back against the monsters that hunt them using traps and the environment to corner and scrap them. All the while exploring these locations for the secrets that lay just beneath the surface.

name: Panic Palette Portable
description: Panic Palette Portable is a port of Panic Palette for PlayStation Portable.

name: Full House Kiss 2
description: Full House Kiss 2 is a sequel to Full House Kiss for PlayStation 2.

name: Love Drops: Miracle Doukyo Monogatari
description: Love Drops: Miracle Doukyo Monogatari is an erotic otome game by Sugar Beans.

name: Disney's Animated Storybook: 101 Dalmatians
description: Relive the events of Disney's 101 Dalmatians in an educational animated picture book with minigames.

name: Love Drops
description: A port of Love Drops: Miracle Doukyo Monogatari for PlayStation 2. It censors the erotic content and adds new scenes and cg's.

name: KinoCon! Defend my sweet home!
description: A doujin game by Alice Margatroid Project based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Kekkon Marriage
description: Kekkon Marriage is a visual novel for PlayStation and Sega Saturn.

name: Ouji-sama Lv1
description: Ouji-sama Lv1 is an RPG game made by Alice Blue, a subsidiary of Alice Soft. This was their second released project. This game is one of the few Alice Soft non-18+ related games, though the addition disc adds yaoi to the game.

name: Ouji-sama Lv2
description: Ouji-sama Lv2 is a erotic visual novel for PC.

name: Miss Princess Miss Pri
description: Miss Princess Miss Pri is an otome game from Ruby Party and Koei-Tecmo based on a shoujo manga by Seizuki Madoka.

name: If
description: If - Invitations from Fantastic stories is a erotic game developed by Active.

name: Luna Child no Saishuu Bouei Line 2
description: A doujin game by ENAMEL SWORD based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Bomb Meirin
description: This game appears to be based on Bomber King.

name: Spy Rumble
description:
The game is an identity concealment game in which players are divided into two camps, the agent camp and the spy camp, and must take action to achieve their respective victory conditions.
An enemy spy is mixed in with the agents called in by Operation C. The purpose of the spy is to sabotage the agents' activities and take them all out. The spy's objective is to disrupt the agents' activities and eliminate them all.

name: DKO: Divine Knockout
description: DKO friends in this Third-Person Physics Brawler, set in a stylized world of Gods and Mythology. Smash your foes in 3v3 gamemodes like King of the Hill and Oddball, or win intense 1v1 duels.

name: The Galactic Junkers
description: Become the space captain you always wanted to be. There are just a few problems, your ship needs work, there’s a price on your head, and your crew are idiots. Seek your fortune and the truth in The Galactic Junkers, a comedic space combat adventure game.

name: Etherlium: AI Arise
description:
Wild action video game, where with hovertanks and your abilities, you will face other ships to survive.

Face each other in different game modes, as well as in its story mode where you must fight against the relentless coldness of artificial intelligence.

Work in progress.

name: Buta
description: "Buta" is a heart felt story told through text based indie gameplay.

name: Pac-Man
description: Tengen released a port of the Famicom version of Pac-Man for the NES. It was first officially licensed, but was later re-released as an unlicensed black cartridge.

name: The Preservation Project
description: A Super Mario 64 ROM hack which aims to recreate the SpaceWorld 1995 demo of the game.

name: Trash Tycoon
description: Get rich and build your own Empire! You’ll become the idle Savior of our planet, plus you’ll make a lot of money by selling garbage. Your idle success will make other people reflect on the environmental problems around them - save the environment and protect nature, forests, and fields.

name: Don't Let Me Down
description: Sin descripción

name: Spirittea
description: A slice-of-life RPG set in east Asia, Spirittea is a story about a city author heading out to a mountain town to pick up inspiration for their book. In doing so, they find a magical teapot that allows them to see into the spirit world. Strange occurrences plague the town, and it's up to the player to find and appease the spirits by rebuilding their bathhouse and managing it to a high standard in order to allow them to soak away their troubles. This then frees up the townspeople, who will look to bond with you over food, games, karaoke, fishing and bug catching, giving you plenty of inspiration for your novel!

name: Here to There
description: A singleplayer puzzle FPS. The player attempts to solve each area, making progress towards the end.

name: Dock King
description: You're an orphan, raised on the mean docks of a pirate shanty town. Become the greatest merchant known to pirate-kind, to get a chance at meeting the merchant king, rumored to be your father. Fish, haggle, or even steal to achieve your goals.

name: Putin Orcs Defender
description: Putin leads his orc army to invade Ukraine. Putin's orcs want to plunder vodka and washing machines, and to slaughter everyone. You must take up arms to fight back their invasion.

name: Tomb Explorer VR
description: Tomb Explorer VR is an adventure game where you navigate/explore ancient ruins and tombs in search of historical treasures, relics and artifacts.

name: At Your Service
description: At Your Service is a wacky co-op party game you can play with up to four players. Visit chaotic futuristic and fantasy themed homes and get them tidy any way you can! Whether it’s an angry magician or a grumpy dad trying to slow you down, just make sure you make a clean getaway!

name: Twenty, in Total
description: Twenty, in Total is a puzzle game where you search for three keys in order to escape a time loop. The only catch is that every time the loop resets, you lose all your keys! Figure out each puzzle and complete them as fast as possible in one loop.

name: 30 Days in Red Army
description: 30 Days in Red Army is a simple text RPG with pixelated graphic and randomized events and results.

name: Cat Lovescapes
description: Sneak Black cat through the house and help him reach his forbidden love!

name: Hen, Chicks and Cats
description: Save all the chicks, but choose your moves carefully or they might fall into the wrong paws.

name: Unrepeatable
description: Fight your way through a giant sudoku map battling with evil robots. Unravel this journey's mystery by completing levels. Use your mind, your heart, and your guts. Remember, numbers can't repeat.

name: Sex Search 2: Ultimate
description: Plunge into the world of relaxation and light erotica! Mindfulness logic game with many modes.

name: Furry Cybersex
description: Furry Cybersex is a unique adult game which combines interesting logic puzzle with exiting animations of furry girls that you earn after successfully passed levels!

name: Virtue's Heaven
description: Virtue’s Heaven is an expressive, 2D action adventure. Explore a world that has been stuck in an endless day for as long as anyone can remember, free your friends from prison and gain enough Zeal to end the Age of Reason.

name: Zuria
description: Build your own tank and battle with other players! Using building tool create unique shape, add weapons, movement and compete with other players in construction skills.

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Pathogen
description: Continue the Aliens: Fireteam Elite story with new environments, maps, cosmetics, and a campaign that puts the crew of the Endeavor into their most perilous mission yet.

name: Ground Divers
description: In Ground Divers has players guiding the rabbit-like mining robot Tsuruhashi into increasingly complex mine shafts of their own creation. They'll be digging for "rare" matter as well as battling underground enemies, building Pit Relay Systems to help offer upgrades and supporting units along the way, and more.

name: Freaked Fleapit
description: Hell never looked this good! Save your soul in a wild cocktail of rhythm-based dungeon crawling and date sims, and dance your way through 9 circles of Hell to heart-pumping music. Which lady of the Fleapit will be the one to join you on your trip out of Purgatory?

name: Nitro Kid
description: Synthwave roguelike deckbuilder set in the neon 80's. Pick your agent. Build your deck. Hit card combos and fight through the floors of INFINITY tower. Featuring 30+ Synthwave tracks composed exclusively for the game.

name: Hot Shots Golf Fore!
description: A PS2 classic, Hot Shots Golf Fore! is the fourth installment in the ClapHanz series of interactive golf titles. Boasting 24 playable characters and 15 courses, the game includes tournament play, VS mode, mini-golf, and 4-player local multiplayer mode.

name: VergeWorld
description: Fly, crash, and adapt in this post-apocalyptic high-speed combat racing roguelite. VergeWorld mixes procedurally generated intense action and airship customization with the retro PSX-era 3D visuals and synthwave music.

name: Block N Load 2
description: Get ready to assemble, smash and dominate! Face off in epic 5v5 matches where you can build up and destroy every block on any level while playing as the 22nd century’s greatest heroes. Work together and utilize insane abilities to claim victory!

name: Glitch Busters: Stuck on You
description: It’s a normal day on the net, until a virus outbreak turns everything upside-down. Only your squad of Glitch Busters can take on the net’s kookiest bugs in an online world gone haywire in this 1-4 player co-op 3rd person shooter.

name: Starkeepers
description: Starkeepers is an action-packed multiplayer online that casts players as Astrals – high dimensional beings capable of space-time magic roaming the multiverse. Venture into mythological epics to take your righteous stand against cosmic threats, or secretly align yourself with different faction powers trying to influence the course of past history.

name: Vice Undercover
description: Vice Undercover is a 1980's narco thriller where the only way to stop the deadly cartel is from within. Go undercover. Expose the cartel. Hack the drug war.

name: Shadow and Bone: Enter the Fold
description:
Shape the fate of the Grishaverse. Travel war-torn Ravka and choose which powers prevail in this interactive adventure based on the fantasy series.

You determine the choices of the iconic heroes of "Shadow and Bone" in this interactive RPG featuring original adventures based on the Netflix series and bestselling books. Explore the world as Alina, Jesper, Sturmhond and General Kirigan as you discover previously untold stories set between Seasons 1 and 2 of the hit Netflix show. Encounter familiar faces, new villains, hard choices and dramatic twists in this narrative RPG that puts the player in charge as the story unfolds.

name: Too Hot to Handle: Love is a Game
description: This game, a dating sim, follows the same rules as the TV show and will feature innuendo, plot twists, and romance.

name: The Queen's Gambit Chess
description: This game features lessons, puzzles, and matches that can be played against real opponents or AI characters based on individuals from the show. Take some lessons from Mr Shaibel, play matches against Borgov or compete against friends in this love letter to the show.

name: Lucky Luna
description: Lucky Luna is a vertical scrolling platformer in which players will explore temples and dungeons while learning about the past of the protagonist Luna. Interestingly, there’s no jump button in the game.

name: Reigns: Three Kingdoms
description: Reigns: Three Kingdoms is inspired by the beloved Chinese epic, The Romance of the Three Kingdoms. This game will thrust you into the turbulent final years of the Han dynasty. Swipe your way through negotiations, relationships and strategic alliances!

name: Poinpy
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Bounce up, dodge adorable baddies and feed the blue beast that's hot on your heels. A vertical climber from the creator of the award-winning Downwell.

Keep going higher and higher because new and more challenging areas await. Earn and unlock abilities that will help you jump into your next run with a better shot at reaching the end.

name: Atrapa la Bandera
description: Sin descripción

name: Yum Yum! Dating Show
description:
A send-up of dating shows and anime tropes, about 20 minutes per playthrough. Multiple choices - ooh! But only 1 true ending!

May contain a rude word or two, and a lot of innuendo. But apart from that it's innocent enough

name: Nailed It! Baking Bash
description:
Calling all home bakers! Host a party for your pals to see who creates the best-looking – or worst-looking – cakes in this game based on the hit series.
Welcome to the most frantic and creative baking competition. Grab a group of friends and see who can best re-create the game's edible masterpieces. Can you nail it?

name: Hello Kitty and Friends: Happiness Parade
description:
Create a grand spectacle with Hello Kitty and friends. Make new allies and lean on your abilities to avoid traps that can rain on your parade!
Play as Hello Kitty as you and two friends start a tour through a fantasy world to bring joy to its citizens. Along the way, you'll find new friends to join you – the more the merrier as the festivities grow.
But beware of Kuromi! She's jealous of your many fans and wants the parade to fail. She's banded together with Nyanmi, who's built an army of mechanical underlings to help them with their work. They've set traps to ruin all of your hard work.
Harness your abilities and the power of friendship to convince everyone – even Kuromi – to join the fun. Dance on, despite the pitfalls, to keep the party going!

name: FarmVille 3
description: FarmVille is a series of agriculture-simulation social network game developed and published by Zynga in 2009. It is similar to Happy Farm, and Farm Town. Its gameplay involves various aspects of farmland management, such as plowing land, planting, growing, and harvesting crops, harvesting trees and raising livestock.

name: The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria
description: The only survival crafting game set in the Fourth Age of Middle-earth, the iconic fantasy world created by J.R.R. Tolkien.

name: Shoulders of Giants
description: Shoulders of Giants is an explosively colourful roguelike where players simultaneously control a mysterious mech and the gunslinging amphibian riding on its back. Work alone, with a friend, or as one member of a four-person online co-op team, cutting through waves of enemies on a quest to rescue the galaxy from the forces of Entropy!

name: Rocket League: Season 7
description: Welcome, esteemed Rocketeers! Season 7 features luxurious rewards like the Maestro Car and golden painted pro tier items. Rank up in the Utopia Coliseum (Gilded) Arena, or compete for tournament rewards.

name: Good Heavens!
description: Good Heavens! is a procedurally generated open world crafting RPG for 1-8 players. Be a farmer, hunter, trader or warrior and explore the promised lands full of different races and cultures. Lead the heavens to salvation or who cares, find the best werewolf tavern and get drunk.

name: Exfiltrator: Cyber Stealth Missions
description: Exfiltrator: Cyber Stealth Missions features 30+ levels full of retro stealth action. Evade guards, dodge cameras, and solve puzzles to become the ultimate cyber agent. Your performance will be ranked and rewarded with achievements and unlocks.

name: Will This Bitter Night Bring Change?
description: Follow Hornet and Emily in their attempt to escape the City, in all its neon glory.

name: Weeping Falls Massacre
description: 80's horror inspired FPS, a nightmarish scene taking place at an abandoned orphanage.

name: Deliver Us Mars: Deluxe Edition
description:
Deliver Us Mars is a sci-fi adventure game developed by KeokeN Interactive and released in 2023. It is a sequel to Deliver Us the Moon. It follows the story of astronaut Kathy Johanson as she embarks on a mission to Mars to recover powerful colony ships known as the ARKs, which the Outward group stole. The game combines exploration, puzzle-solving, and platforming elements as players navigate the harsh Martian environment and uncover the mysteries surrounding the disappearance of the ARKs.

The Deliver Us Mars: Deluxe Edition includes the base game and the original soundtrack, featuring tracks composed by Sander van Zanten.

name: Titanic II: Orchestra for Dying at Sea
description: Tragedy is comedy & comedy is tragedy. In this allegorical game, sacrifice your life to save the one you love from drowning in the icy waters of the Atlantic, sink to the bottom of the ocean floor and experience the strange, eccentric, haunting world between life and death, memory and reality.

name: Cubit
description: Cubit is an iOS game that resembles 3D sudoku. It was developed by ex-insomniac games employees.

name: Cubit
description: The object of the game is to place pieces so that they form a row of four. The row may be in any direction, may cross the 'planes' to produce a row which for example goes from the bottom right corner to the top left corner. Play can be for two players or one person against the computer. When play is against the computer, the machine will use a sophisticated, fast logic search to produce a superb mental challenge.

name: Crazy Shooters 2
description: Crazy Shooters 2 is a cool game where you can have a lot of fun with your friends. Enter now and create a lobby as you like, or chose one which is created by someone else and fight in the craziest combat that exists.

name: Blackjack
description: Blackjack is an unlicensed game developed by Odyssey Software and published by American Video Entertainment. The game is just basic blackjack, but with some configurations such as how much money it takes to win the game, and palate-swapping the card colors.

name: Ouji-sama Lv1.5
description: Ouji-sama Lv 1.5 is a collection of smaller games based solely on Ouji-sama Lv1.

name: If 2
description: If 2 is an visual novel game, developed and published by Active, which was released in Japan in 1993.

name: If 3
description: If 3 is an Adventure game, developed and published by Active, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Dear Girl: Stories Hibiki - Hibiki Tokkun Daisakusen!
description: Dear Girl: Stories Hibiki - Hibiki Tokkun Daisakusen! is an visual novel game, developed by HuneX and published by ASCII Media Works, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Hoshi no Mahoroba
description: First BL game released in Japan for consumer consoles. Tells the tale of a group of boys with the ability to speak to spirits and harness their powers.

name: E'tude Prologue: Yureugoku Kokoro no Katachi
description: A coastal town called "South Aose" surrounded by the sea and mountains is a place where lots of nature still remains. Two normal high school students go to a school in this town. The story starts in the special winter of the 3rd year of school when these two protagonists meet.

name: Teikoku Sensenki
description: A battle/love sim set in ancient China, about a military commander taking on enemies in 3-on-3 battles, then heading back to find romance.

name: Idle Human
description:
In IDLE HUMAN we give you the unique chance to discover and create the various parts of a human right from the first cell!
Discover the amazing sequence in which a human body unravels, starting from the very first bones to every organs leading to the nerves and muscles then, finally, a complete human body!

name: Brigadoon: The Quest of Time
description: Based off the original book and musical written by Alan Jay Lerner comes a brand new indie title inspired by the ever-popular The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask! It follows a similar formula with a time cycle forcing you to do a set of tasks at a certain time in order to make progress. The game takes place in Scotland where a visitor named Tommy Albright from New York was on a hunting trip but gets lost, and finds himself stuck in the land of Brigadoon, which is cursed to appear for one day and disappear for 100 years! Help Tommy learn the secrets of Brigadoon and break the spell so he can escape! Help NPCs in a number of quests! Solve puzzles and unlock secrets! This game will have many surprises along the way, so it's guaranteed to be a blast!

name: Idle Human 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Moon Rabbit: AFK RPG
description: A role-playing video game where you control Lyn, a moon rabbit whose goal is to recover the Moonlight to end the darkness that plagues her world.

name: Ninja Battle
description: Hiding Skills, which can hide the user's appearance even in the daylight. Clone Technique that creates copies of the user. Various Ninjutsu that makes the user breathe fire and bends the earth. You can experience a ninja with all of those skills at "Ninja Battle".

name: Time Travel
description: Sin descripción

name: Moeru Danmaku STG Moedan
description: Moedan is a practice/training shmup made by D.N.A.Softwares. It features some of the cast of the Touhou series. It also features characters from another series, Moetan, a series of books which teaches Japanese people to say incredibly silly and useless things in English.

name: Rainshade
description: Rainshade is a pseudo-RPG about making friends and parrying your enemies.

name: Touhou Seicross
description: A Touhou Doujin game based on Seicross, developed by Hachimitsu-Kumasan.

name: First Love / Late Spring
description:
"First Love / Late Spring" is a brief meditation on mediocrity, fragility, and the quiet mounting frustration of trying to keep the conversation alive even though we all knew there was never anything there from the start.

Or something like that.

name: Penny Dell Jumbo Crosswords 2
description: Penny Dell Jumbo Crosswords 2 includes 150 all-new crossword puzzles to challenge and stimulate your mind.

name: Light 'em Up
description: Light the path from the source tile to the destination tiles.

name: Saihate Hospital
description: A mysterious RPG in which children in "Saihate-cho" fight with each other.

name: After the Fall: Frontrunner Season
description: From new maps, weapons and system updates, we have an update from the development team on what's coming up next for After the Fall!

name: Erovoice! Sexy Voices Lead to a Successful Love Life
description:
The story’s protagonist is a young man infatuated with the audio design in adult works he enjoys. Oftentimes, he'll end up focusing on the audio much more than the actual visuals, making him an auralist. One day, while browsing through job applications, he stumbles across a posting for a general affairs office worker, made by Cuckoo Clock. The company focuses on voice acting recording for erotic games, working with a number of voice actresses to provide the necessary samples and dialogue.

Overjoyed by the opportunity to work together with the actresses he adores so much, the protagonist happily applies for the job. Soon, he begins working at the office, performing a number of sometimes unexpectedly intimate tasks. In his line of work, he comes to meet new and long-time voice actresses, as well as spend time with the team’s sound engineer and manager. Just what kind of trouble could he get into while working for the studio?

name: Nijuuei
description:
Nijuuei is a visual novel adventure game set in Japan in the year 1640 centering around Futatsu-kage Sougen, a swordsman who, for reasons unknown to him, holds host to an antagonistic and violent sentient curse he dubs "Nijuuei" that causes him to cast two shadows and wishes to possess him.
The game begins as Sougen travels to the strange and cursed island of Awahomurajima in hopes of finding a way to dispel the curse placed upon him.
Gameplay consists of the player making choices, some of which being timed in battle scenes, and following different story routes to the conclusion.
Nijuuei features the "PIS" (Phrase Interaction System) where some words or phrases are highlighted and may be selected to view an explanation of the highlighted phrase or an expansion upon a related topic.

name: Adam & Eve
description: Adam & Eve is a Balloon Fight clone made and released by NTDEC in 1991 or 1992.

name: Akiba's Trip: Undead & Undressed - Kati Route
description: Sin descripción

name: Aladdin
description: Aladdin is a port of the SNES version of the game of the same name, made by Hummer Team in 1995. The game is one of the more well known pirate ports and is commonly found on multicarts (in its MMC3 hacked form).

name: Aladdin
description: Aladdin is a Famicom port of the Sega Mega Drive game of the same name, made by Super Game and published by Realtec.

name: Arkanoid: Eternal Battle
description: The return of the iconic block breaker game from prestigious Japanese video game company Taito!

name: Greedventory
description: Greedventory is a gorgeous pixel-art narrative RPG experience, where the only thing between you and an embarrassingly swift death is your mouse. Strike, parry, and cast powerful spells on your enemies, loot ancient treasures, explore a brutal realm, and become the hero you never wanted to be!

name: I am Future
description: I Am Future is a relaxing survival game about building a cozy rooftop camp amid a flooded post-apocalyptic city. Set up a farm, cook delicious food, dismantle tools for crafting resources, automate chores by recruiting cute robots, and uncover the mystery behind the catastrophe.

name: Little Bear Chef
description: Little Bear Chef is a cozy 3D cooking platformer where you play as a tiny bear chef in a regular sized kitchen. It's all about coming up with creative and funny solutions to cook the recipe at hand.

name: Melodyssey
description:
In Melodyssey you follow the story of a young kid’s journey through beautiful landscapes in search of lost inspiration. There are no enemies here, so you can enjoy the playful environments and block moving puzzles without stressing over heart containers or counter attacks.

Listen to calm soothing music, chat with curious characters and unlock relaxing ASMR scenes in this stress-free exploration adventure.

name: Usagi Shima
description: Usagi Shima is a relaxing, idle bunny collecting game. You’ve been tasked as caretaker of an abandoned island — as you decorate it over time, curious (but adorable!) bunny visitors start to appear! Buy toys, plants, and build structures on an abandoned island to entice curious bun tourists to pay your island a visit. Discover, take photos, and make friends with a variety of bunnies that visit based on how you’ve decorated and arranged the island.

name: Chicken Journey
description: Play as an adorable chicken in this relaxing platformer. Jump, climb and solve puzzles to find the answer to the ultimate question chicken can ask.

name: Freeride
description: Freeride is a game about YOU. Board a train to the Spirit World in our oddball RPG where you make friends, use telekinesis, find secrets, consume ice cream and chart your own path. Each character is uniquely troubled, and in helping them find their way, you might just find yourself, too.

name: Paper Animal Adventure
description: Paper Animal Adventure is a cute roguelike game where you can explore a colorful world, fight scary enemies, and relax with your friends at the campfire! Will you be the one to seal the timelines and find the missing king?

name: Lovebirb
description: Play as a heartbroken bird, ready to dip back in the dating scene, and impress your dates by flirting to the rhythm of the music.

name: Oddada
description: A tiny musical world, where houses sing, machines drum, and you create music with them. Ob-la-di, Ob-la-da, Oddada!

name: Bubblegum Galaxy
description: Bubblegum Galaxy is a cute building strategy game about rebuilding the galaxy tile by tile. Discover and design new planets, complete missions, explore your office and befriend your co-workers... all while trying to find out who deleted the galaxy!

name: Soulitaire
description: Soulitaire is a relaxed story game in which you can catch a glimpse of the future of your interlocutors via solitaire. However, you might have to interpret what the cards mean and which future they foretell. Decide what your customers should do to face their problems, and become a part of their life!

name: Toroa
description: Soar, swoop and glide across the vast Pacific Ocean as Toroa, the Northern Royal Albatross. Discover the hidden wonders of the sea and sky on your epic journey home with the help of Māori God of the winds, Tāwhirimātea.

name: Olliefrog Toad Skater
description: Olliefrog Toad Skater is the amphibian-based skateboarding game where its easy to be steezy! Create your own little custom cute frog or toad and hit up the local skatepark for a brief skating session, or tackle the more extensive story/career modes and ollie, grind, and kickflip your way to the top.

name: Miska
description: Miska is a narrative-driven adventure game with a strong focus on Australian flora and fauna. Rekindle your connection to family and nature through acts of restoration.

name: Bread & Fred
description: Grab your best bud for help in this new co-op challenge to help two adorable penguins, Bread and Fred, reach the top of the snowy summit. Time your jumps, cling to walls and swing across gaps to see how far you can make it before you tumble all the way back down the mountain.

name: Kity Builder
description: Explore relaxing deserted islands and build cute cities over them as Kity, the builder cat. Customize the buildings and environment at your own pace in a peaceful, stress-free setting.

name: Petit Island
description: Welcome to the beautiful and tropical Petit Island! Relive your grandpaw's youthful adventures by exploring the island and capturing beautiful photos in this heartwarming open-world photo exploration game. Preserve his memories before they fade away!

name: Flore
description: Flore is a dodging game in which you have to bring back life on barren planets. You will have to use your reflexes through the four seasons of the game to bring back trees and animals, but beware of the dark matter!

name: Pine Hearts
description: Pine Hearts is a cosy little narrative-adventure game set in the sleepy scenery of Pine Hearts Caravan Park. Explore the great outdoors as you uncover items, unlock new paths, and discover all the little secrets stuffed throughout the Park.

name: Love, Ghostie
description: Become a wholesome ghost matchmaker and grow relationships between the manor’s residents! Gift items to lift their spirits, set them up on dates, and watch love bloom! Discover cute romances with a unique story between every pair of residents! How will love blossom in your manor?

name: Super Mini Mart
description: Super Mini Mart is a cozy take on the management genre with a charming 3D aesthetic and an endearing cast of characters. Stock, supervise, and manage store activities in a laid-back environment, befriending locals and turning those one-off bargain hunters into life-long loyal customers!

name: PaperKlay
description: PaperKlay is a short and sweet 3D platformer where you unfold, open and rotate the paper environment in order to freely explore the cardboard world.

name: Skye Tales
description: A gentle puzzle-exploration game set in a world that couldn’t be happier to see you.

name: Kulebra and the Souls of Limbo
description: An adventure where you’ll meet the many good and not-so-good folks of Limbo. Use your wits and keen eye to gather clues from the residents and find items that will help uncover the mystery of Limbo and its curse that traps souls into repeating the same day on loop.

name: Psychroma
description: Psychroma is a narrative-driven side-scroller where you play as a digital medium. Confront the past by piecing together the broken memories of a cybernetic house, and exorcise the ghosts in the machine.

name: Mossfield Origins
description: A small cozy city builder style game where all buildings are built from the same foundation! Take your time, build a self sustaining community for your residents in this relaxing builder, with no time pressure or external forces. Upgrade foundations via tech tree to redefine and refactor your space.

name: Vacuum Story
description: A vacuum cleaner, tied to his daily cleaning routine, passively experiences the events that affect the family that owns it.

name: Once Human
description: Once Human is a multiplayer open-world survival game set in a strange, post-apocalyptic future.
